name: Dousoukai 2: Again & Refrain
overview: Again and Refrain are originally two standalone PC games from the same series, but ported to Dreamcast they were released as a single standalone game that includes both scenarios. Dreamcast platform does not have these games released as standalone. Dousoukai 2: Again & Refrain Dreamcast game contains scenarios from these two PC games: Dousoukai: Again Dousoukai: Refrain
